div.h2: "Preparing students for the challenges of tomorrow."

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h1.div: Welcome to the Franklin County District Website!

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

div.p: 🥕 Starting Tuesday, April 14th, we will provide a week’s worth (5 days) of meals in one day. There will be 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches served at all of the same sites at the same times as the last 3 weeks. We will plan to continue to serve meals every Tuesday each week through the end of the school year. Meals are for any child 2-18 years old and child must be present.

p.strong: Click HERE to read the FCSS Strategic Plan
Click HERE to comment on the FCSS Strategic Plan

div.p: March 16th - May 20th: No School for Students

li.a: Click HERE for FCSS Covid19 Parent Letter
Click HERE for the 2019 Tax Digest/5 Year History
Click to download flu shot information
Click here for the 2019-2020 Testing Calendar

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Governor's Office of Student Achievement publishes an annual report card for each district in the state. The site gives a variety of relevant data on attendance, demographics, standardized assessment scores, and much more.

p.a: Click HERE to see the Franklin County School System's Annual Report Card

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-EehZO jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: The Franklin County School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, age, disability, or sex in its employment practices, student programs and dealings with the public. It is the policy of the Franklin County Board of Education to comply fully with the requirements of Title VI, Title IX, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Americans with Disabilities Act, The Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act, and all accompanying regulations. Contact admin@franklin.k12.ga.us to request access to or notify Franklin County Schools about on-line information or functionality that is currently inaccessible.
